text:
@realDonaldTrump Old people dead. White Supremacists getting stronger.
Trump and DeVos stealing money for pet projects. Minorities literally hunted in the streets. What's greater than that? Idiot.
#TrumpIsAnIdiot 
#COVID #COVIDIDIOTS #WhiteSupremacy 
#BlackLivesMatter 
#coronavirus
